title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated cheese.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture quickly.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until slightly charred.
Cook onions and tomato puree in a pan.
Add chicken and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
